name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-ws
description: Web Service for creating thumbnails and index used by the TagSpaces application
author: Stanimir Marinov <s.marinov@structmedia.com>

scripts.install-node-linux: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=linux TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.install-node-mac: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=darwin TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.install-node-win: npx cross-env PD_PLATFORM=node TARGET_PLATFORM=win32 TARGET_ARCH=x64 node install/ws.js
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run install-node && npm run build:prod && npm publish --access public
